Fundraising for Sturdy Tables and Solid Art

Oct 4, 2024 by Chris Gebert

Our own Ms. Hedrick is looking to raise money for new art tables in her art room.

Please donate and help to spread the word!

Donors Choose campaign - Sturdy Tables Make for Solid Art: https://secure.donorschoose.org/project/sturdy-tables-make-for-solid-art/8546803
